forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low 0C.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a few snow showers. Lows overnight in the low 30s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers this evening becoming more scattered later. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady light snow later. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow late at night. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow late at night. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the evening. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
